title: Jedi Justice Cruiser

Damage: 9D '''Capsule''': The Justice Cruisers were decommissioned after Stark Hyperspace War because the Senate feared the Jedi's military might. After being stripped of their weapons, some of these ships found their way to the black market and were considered formidable starships due to the addition of black market weapons.
